00052     class MDC
00053     {
00054     private:
00055         MDC();
00056         MDC(const MDC &rOther); // Not implemented
00057         // virtual ~MDC(); // Use compiler default
00058         MDC &operator=(const MDC &rOther); // Not implemented
00059

00061         static QString get(const QString &rKey);
00062         static QHash<QString, QString> context();
00063 
00067         static MDC *instance();

00071     
00072     private:
00073         static QHash<QString, QString> *localData();
00074         
00075     private:
00076         QThreadStorage< QHash<QString, QString> * > mHash;

00105     inline MDC::MDC() :
00106         mHash()
00107     {}
00108     
00109     inline void MDC::put(const QString &rKey, const QString &rValue)
00110     {   localData()->insert(rKey, rValue); }
00111     
00112     inline void MDC::remove(const QString &rKey)
00113     {   localData()->remove(rKey);  }
